movie.title: Anomaly
movie.description_intro: The terrifying story of a family that experienced the biggest demonic possession after moving into a house plagued by malicious spirits.
movie.description_full: The terrifying story of a family that experienced the biggest demonic possession after moving into a house plagued by malicious spirits.

movies.title: Arthur 3: The War of the Two Worlds
movies.title_english: Arthur 3: The War of the Two Worlds
movies.title_long: Arthur 3: The War of the Two Worlds (2010)
movies.summary: Maltazard, the Evil M, is now 7 feet tall and evolving among the humans, causing terror wherever he goes. His goal is simple: forming an army of giant henchmen and ruling over the universe. Meanwhile, Arthur is still a Minimoy, and thus in a state where he's unable to fend him off. With the help of Selenia and Betameche, he hatches a plan to regain his usual size: all they must do is infiltrate Arthur's house through the pipeworks, catch an electric train from his bedroom to his grandfather's study and find an elixir that will make him grow back to his human size. Sounds simple enough, if it weren't for Darkos, Maltazard's own son, hot on their tails.
movies.description_full: Maltazard, the Evil M, is now 7 feet tall and evolving among the humans, causing terror wherever he goes. His goal is simple: forming an army of giant henchmen and ruling over the universe. Meanwhile, Arthur is still a Minimoy, and thus in a state where he's unable to fend him off. Sounds simple enough, if it weren't for Darkos, Maltazard's own son, hot on their tails.

movies.title: Tragedy Girls
movies.summary: A twist on the slasher genre, following two death-obsessed teenage girls who use their online show about real-life tragedies to send their small mid-western town into a frenzy, and cement their legacy as modern horror legends.
movies.description_full: A twist on the slasher genre, following two death-obsessed teenage girls who use their online show about real-life tragedies to send their small mid-western town into a frenzy, and cement their legacy as modern horror legends.

movies.title: Roar
movies.summary: Ravening jungle beasts assemble in flocks to invade an otherwise quiet home where they terrorize the visiting family of their keeper.
movies.description_full: Ravening jungle beasts assemble in flocks to invade an otherwise quiet home where they terrorize the visiting family of their keeper.
movies.synopsis: Ravening jungle beasts assemble in flocks to invade an otherwise quiet home where they terrorize the visiting family of their keeper.

movies.title: Bad Reputation
movies.summary: A high school girl wrongly branded as the school slut embraces her 'bad reputation' and takes revenge on the kids who have made her life a living hell.
movies.description_full: A high school girl wrongly branded as the school slut embraces her 'bad reputation' and takes revenge on the kids who have made her life a living hell.
